div.p: Curia legali tenta per Balliuos .

Quo die accedens ad barram Bricius filius Dunccani cum prelocutoribus suis domino de
Gordon' et Johanne Inchemartyn Archdiacono Rossensis . extendebant per plegium primo . quod exquo An
dreas filius Gilberti ab eo recepit tres pipas de wad et dict' wad de illis pipis eua
cuauit . ponendo illud wad in quadam domo sua . tenendo illud vltra pro xl dies . non satisfaciend'
summam per ipsum debitam dicto Bricio infra dictum tempus . quod dictus Andreas iniuste ab eo tenet
Summa xxiij li' x s' . dictam summam et quod sibi satisfaciet de eadem . Dictus Andreas audiens dictam calumpniam
et dicti plegii Inuencionem . stetit nichil respondendo . Non negando nec concedendo nec a
uisacionem petendo . Tunc dictus . Johannes Inchemartyn . tanquam prelocutor dicti Bricij
extendebat per plegium . quod dictus Bricius Dunccani ad suam peruenit calumpniam causa
non defensa exquo dictus Andreas uoluit negare vel concedere vel aliud legittimum responsum
dare . Quod plegius dictus Andreas recontrariauit . et sic ad wardam curie . vnde partibus
remotis . curia diligenter auisata decreuit et per os Johannis filij laurencij iudicatoris curie
datum fuit pro iudicio quod vltimum plegium per dictum Johannem Inchemartyn nomine dicti bricij
extensus fuit valoris et recontrariacio facta per dictum Andream nullius valoris et dictus
Andreas in amerciamento curie
Philippus Johannis primo die vocatus ad sectam . Johannis Roberti Webstar non comparuit
Actio mota inter Johannem Walteri et Johannem Banerman submittitur ad amicabilem composicionem et cetera

Johannes lowdone' in amerciamento curie quia non fecit ad plegium suum erga Johannem cristini de
Durris quod facere tenetur

Actio mota inter Gilbertum Kynros et Johannem buchane submittitur ad amicabilem composicionem pre
sentando defectum Ballivis .

Actio mota inter Willelmum de Camera filium et Johannem qwite submittitur ad amicabilem composicione proborum
hominum presentando defectum ballivis
Johannes tolly in voluntate ballivorum pro percussione cristini crusank
Cristinus crusank

EodemThere is a partly cut off manicula in the left margin die Johannes smale venit coram ballivis in plena curia offerens se paratum in omnibus
ad faciendum Dauid blabre quod determinatum fuit pre tempore sibi per assisam . Que determinacio
scribitur in quadam curiam precedente et super hoc peciit instrumentum . testibus ballivis

Super quadam actione mota et ventilata inter Rogerum Willelmi et Andream sprunt fuit leua
ta assisa et iurata et remota per se in solio assise Johannes henrici prelocutor dicti Rogeri allega
uit dicens quod fuerunt presentes quidam vicini . qui sciebant de conuencionibus et contractibus inter
dictum Rogerum et andream factis et extendebat per plegium . quod dicta assisa non debebat determinare
super dicta actione . quousque audierit veredictum illorum vicinorum qui veritatem rei sciebant

Statim et incontinenter Thomas Roule prelocutor Andree sprunt' extendebat per plegium
quod exquo Johannes filius henrici prelocutor dicti Rogeri obstruxit assisam impediendo
eam determinare super dicta actione / dictus Andreas sprunt quitus fuit a . calumpnia dicti
Rogeri / de dicta actione secundum prius facta acta et allegata .
Memorandum de processu quarti diei . Willelmi laurencij . contra patricium fleschar' .

Ista sunt ordinati pro communi vtilitate burgi . et libertatis eiusdem

It is ordenit with hale consent of the Comonateiz . that ilke man duelland in the burgh
wateuir str or condicion' wat he be of sal stand gard and Rass' With the Aldirman and the
Bailliez of the tovn and for to kepe the Common profite of the tovne' and the fredommys of
it and to suppouale and maintene the officeris of the tovne in thair office doand and thair
nechburris als fra schath and supprice vndir the payne of Banysyng' and tyttyn dovne
of his huss' . and giff he has na huss' vndir the payne of banysyng' And the gudis
eschete

Als' at thai syss' to the ryngyng of the Comon' bell' and to biddyngis of the officeris
of the tovne / And giff ony soudane Affray commys / that thai be redy vndir the said'
payne And giff any heris or persayvis ony schath aperand to the tovne or ony
at duellis in it at thai mak warnyng' vndir the said payne

Alss' that nane haff lord na lordschip othir na the kyng' . the duke and the Erle of
Marr' . bot his Aldirman and his baillis vndir the said' payne

Als . qwasumeuir has nocht his wapynnys redy and beris thaim nocht sal tyne viij s'
withoute remission' and prisone quill' thar viij s' . be payit

Als that nane reset of herbry ony outduelland' Men in thair huss' bot qwhame at
thai will stand for' / ell or ellis warn the officeris als fast as thair cummyn . vndir
payne of lyffe and tynsale of gudis
